implementation.functions:
-- Netatmo v0.1
-- ServiceID local NAM_SID = "urn:antor-fr:serviceId:Netatmo1"
-- DeviceID
function Netatmo_startup (lul_device) debuglog("Netatmo running...") local data = readSettings(lul_device)
-- check data before process if (data.InSensors == nil or #data.InSensors < 1 or data.heaters == nil or #data.heaters < 1) then debuglog("Configuration erronee") luup.task('Configuration erron√©e',2,'Netatmo', -1) return false end
return true,"ok","Netatmo" end
function readSettings(lul_device) local data = {}
-- Config ID data.client_id = readVariableOrInit(lul_device,NAM_SID, "Client Id", "" ) data.client_secret = readVariableOrInit(lul_device,NAM_SID, "Client Secret", "" ) data.username = readVariableOrInit(lul_device,NAM_SID, "Username", "" ) data.password = readVariableOrInit(lul_device,NAM_SID, "Password", "" )
-- Config Variables data.OpenTempo = tonumber(readVariableOrInit(lul_device,SVT_SID, "Waiting Time Open", "0" ))
-- internal Variables data.ForcedModeState = readVariableOrInit(lul_device,SVT_SID, "Forced Mode", "ForcedOff" )
return data end
